## Content
Our Lab Management section provides information on:\

* PAB lab members and previous alumn
* Onboarding and offboarding protocols
* Information on our Remote Desktop Computers, including CD#s and software lists for each computer
* Information on our PassiveAcoustics Server 
* Staff resources, NEFSC building access and wifi information, professional development and housing resources
* List of media featuring our work, including videos, podcasts, radio clips, webinars, and articles


For any information that needs to be updated/removed, please submit an issue by clicking 'Report an issue' on the top right corner of this page.
